item.title: Trump Says U.S. Oversight of Venezuela Could Last for Years
item.description: In a wide-ranging interview with The New York Times on Wednesday, President Trump said “only time will tell” when it comes to how long the United Stat...

item.title: Kennedy Is Telling Americans How to Eat. It’s Not Crazy Advice.
item.description: Newly released dietary guidelines emphasize protein and full-fat dairy.

item.title: My Grandfather Sexually Abused Countless Children. Could He Have Been Stopped?
item.description: We spend billions of dollars on punishing child sexual abusers and far less on prevention. It’s not stopping the problem. We must rethink our approach...

item.title: Russian Strikes Knock Out Power in Dnipro Region of Ukraine
item.description: The Ukrainian authorities urged residents in the Dnipro region to stock up on water as crews raced to restore service.

item.title: 2 Killed in Shooting Outside Mormon Church in Salt Lake City
item.description: The shooting did not appear to be a targeted attack against the church and seemed to stem from an altercation in its parking lot, the police said.
